articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Snapchat rolls out ‘Topic Chats’ for public conversations - TechCrunch
articles.description: The social network says the new feature will let users chat about what’s happening in the world and across various communities, from Formula 1 to the reality TV show "Below Deck."
articles.content: After primarily focusing on private conversations since its founding, Snapchat is embracing public conversations with a new “Topic Chats” feature. The social network says the feature lets users chat … [+2141 chars]
